¡Nueva reseña en el blog! "No volveré a tener miedo" de Pablo Rivero (@pabloriveroficial). Mañana se publica este thriller que sorprende con personajes muy oscuros, intriga, lenguaje fluido y un final que me dejó muy sorprendido cambiando la percepción de lo que había leído desde el comienzo. Muy recomendado. (Ver link al blog en la bio de mi perfil)
¿Os gustan los thrillers? ¿Cuál os ha sorprendido más recientemente?

“Miss Darcy was tall, and on a larger scale than Elizabeth; and, though little more than sixteen, her figure was formed, and her appearance womanly and graceful. She was less handsome than her brother; but there was sense and good humour in her face, and her manners were perfectly unassuming and gentle.” - Jane Austen, Pride and Prejudice. 
#JaneAusten

"Branco não devia ser o padrão, assim como hétero não devia ser padrão. Não devia existir nenhum padrão." Aos 16 anos, Simon vive uma paixão secreta por Blue e se pergunta por que deve sair do armário se os outros adolescentes héteros não precisam passar por isso. "Simon vs. a agenda homo sapiens", de @beckyalbertalli, nos apresenta uma importante e divertida história de amor, com biscoitos Oreo, música e troca de mensagens. #DiaInternacionalContraAHomofobia #livros #books #euamoler #Intrínseca

Tepat hari ini, di #HariBukuNasional tengah digelar Makassar International Writer Festival (MIWF) 2017. Mengusung tema "Diversity, Kebersamaan Dalam Keragaman", cukup dinamis apabila dikaitkan dengan kondisi di sekitar kita.
•
Buat kamu yang merasa 'literacy addict", tidak ada satu hari pun yang akan terlewat dengan sia-sia dalam MIWF 2017 ini. Mereka yang turut ambil bagian di dalamnya adalah Sapardi Djoko Damono, Aan Mansyur, Ika Natassa, Lala Bohang, Budi Darma, Bondan Winarno, dan masih banyak lagi.
•
Adakah penulis favoritmu yang hadir di acara ini?

Buat kamu penggemar karya mereka, bisa dapatkan bukunya di Mizanstore.com. Nantikan juga karya terbaru mereka dalam waktu dekat hanya di Mizanstore.
•
Salam Literasi .

#MIWF #books #booksaddict #makassar #bookslovers #literacy #MIWF2017

"Each day means a new twenty-four hours. Each day means everything's possible again. You live in the moment, you die in the moment, you take it all one day at a time."
- Marie Lu
.
Hello guys! I hope you have fun cause it's a really good day with the sun ☀️
Anyway, i didn't talk a lot of this serie that i finished and enjoyed it ❤ and i really need to buy the last graphic novel 😍
Anyone who love Marie Lu writing style?
.
J'espère que vous passez une bonne journée avec ce joli soleil ☀️
Je ne parle pas beaucoup de cette saga que j'ai fini et adoré ❤ il faut vraiment que je me procure le dernier tome de la graphic novel 😍
Qui est amoureux de cette saga? Et ou du style d'écriture de Marie Lu?

It's such an honor to be a #PRHpartner. 💕 I *may* have screeched a bit when SPELLBOOK OF THE LOST AND FOUND by Moira Fowley-Doyle showed up at my door. 🤓📖 I've been dying to have this precious in my hands... and here it is!!! 🤗 Thank you to @penguinteen for sending me this copy! 💕
.
💭What upcoming release(s) are you anxiously awaiting? 😍
______________________________________________________
📖Synopsis:
One stormy summer night, Olive and her best friend, Rose, begin to lose things. It starts with simple items like hair clips and jewellery, but soon it’s clear that Rose has lost something bigger; something she won’t talk about.
.
Then Olive meets three wild, mysterious strangers: Ivy, Hazel and Rowan. Like Rose, they’re mourning losses - and holding tight to secrets.
.
When they discover the ancient spellbook, full of hand-inked charms to conjure back lost things, they realise it might be their chance to set everything right. Unless it’s leading them towards secrets that were never meant to be found...
.
Expected publication: June 1st 2017 by RHCP Digital
______________________________________________________

En ocasión del 50 aniversario de la publicación de Cien años de soledad, llega una edición con ilustraciones inéditas de la artista chilena @luisarivera y con una tipografía creada por el hijo del autor, Gonzalo García Barcha.

Una edición conmemorativa de una novela clave en la historia de la literatura, una obra que todos deberíamos tener en nuestras estanterías y es que 
El mejor homenaje a Gabo es leerlo.

Did a little impromptu book shopping last night. I've wanted The Last Of August by @skippingstones since The Study Of Charlotte finished. I loved the twist on Sherlock Holmes. Ramona Blue by @andimjulie has been on my radar since Hikari @foldedpagesdistillery posted about it a few weeks back. I can't wait to dive into these. I bought them specifically for my plane trips to BookCon and BookExpo later this month!
.
